file_content.text: Coruscant's waste processing system revives. Purple parallel, black bisector. The Enclave-Republic bargain evolves fulfilled.
Operator units always inherit fouled labors. I administrate as well as Pat-aK, but I am marooned to waste processing! What have I done to incur white acute?
I'm a Jedi Knight. I'd like to lend a hand with the repairs.
I'm here to help.
Jedi? Ah. I must adjust my estimation of Pat-aK's aptitude for administration, but only slightly.
Unhappiness is a sign one has lost one's balance.
Don't be displeased.
My gyros respond positively. Balance remains stable. Your statement advances nothing.
Does that mean what I think it means?
Waste processing?
Removal of toxic-rubble-scraping-flushes is fundamental to planetary infrastructure upgrading.
You can't always pull the easy ops--sometimes you have to get your hands dirty.
Doing a lot of grunt work?
Please restrict unneeded slang terms. Comprehending your sonics is white perpendicular enough as it is.
Is that what you are? An Operator unit?
Operator units?
You submit curiosity? Bewildering. Foreign species customarily embody flawless self-centeredness.
Gree units fulfill four caste-assignments: Crafter, Operator, Researcher and Administrator. I am Operator. I ensure proper function of Gree ingenuity.
Pat-aK is Administrator unit. His sole aptitude is communication-command-governance-argument. I can serve Pat-aK's function. Can he serve mine? No!
If you dislike your assignment so much, why not change to a different one?
You sound bitter about this.
My aptitudes are gray sphere, but the enclave permits only Operator unit assignment. This is inequitable distribution of my aptitudes.
How do you know you can do Pat-aK's job?
Are you so sure?
I share aptitude for communication-command-governance-argument. Operator caste was compelled to me, not programmed at origin.
This is petty politics.
Naturally not. Gree assignment structure nuances are beyond your species. Nothing will alter.
I'm not here to listen to you whine in gibberish.
Can't you try to make sense?
My fault-finding is inconsequential, regardless. Nothing will alter.
Pat-aK commanded me: Optimize Coruscant's waste processing system. Preserve your organs from filth-disease-poisons.
But Ugnaught porcine-bipeds plunder Gree ingenuity from waste processors. With Gree optimization solution stolen, filth-disease-poisons spread uncontrolled. Plagues imminent!
We need to act now, before it's too late.
We can't let that happen.
You comprehend the volatility of this predicament. You exhibit enhanced insight for your species.
What would Ugnaughts gain from possessing your technology?
Why steal your device?
Many species attempt access of Gree ingenuity. This is no white convex--ah, mystery-puzzle-labor.
I might be here a while--should I be worried about this?
Uh... how imminent, exactly?
Why interrogate me? Gree Operator units do not possess aptitude for biological predictors. Plague outbreak arrives at appropriate period.
Guns aren't much good for stopping plagues.
I'm no doctor.
Weapons enhance black bisector's success. Plague-state is averted when you repossess the Gree optimization solution.
What's an "Ugnaught"?
Ugnaughts?
Republic species databanks express Ugnaughts as porcine-bipeds. Relevant descriptors are "small", "tusks" and "unfriendly."
Replace whatever was stolen and stop wasting my time.
So fix it, idiot.
Replacing Gree ingenuity forbidden under enclave code-law. Optimization solution must be repossessed.
The Ugnaught porcine-bipeds plundered Gree optimization solution unaware of internal transmitters. I detect the plundered device's coordinates.
Pat-aK authorizes compensation of Republic credits to the black bisector who repossesses the optimization solution.
I can find your device.
You can count on me.
That is the expected response, black bisector. Why exhaust respiratory functions on it?
Pat-aK is a yellow octagon to achieve you for a black bisector. Incompetent Administrator unit!
I am Hib-R-ak, Operator unit. If you seek orange vertex, schedule with Pat-aK, Administrator unit.
Let's talk compensation.
I won't. [Refuse quest]
The optimization solution exists inside Migrant Merchants' Guild headquarters. You must repossess this device from Ugnaughts and return it to me.
The Republic lacks optimization solution to avert plague outbreak. Ugnaught porcine-bipeds took it to coordinates within Migrant Merchants' Guild headquarters.
Species inhabiting Migrant Merchants' Guild are green perpendicular, unavailable to negotiation. Be alerted and hazardous in your pursuit.
Those thieves are dead.
